author: James Van Straten
title: Bitcoin Bounces After War-Driven Dip, $98.2K Emerges as Key Level to Maintain Bullish Momentum
description: Geopolitical tensions spark weekend volatility but BTC bounces back maintaining critical on-chain support.
content:
The short-term holder realized price (STH RP) for bitcoin 
 currently sits at $98,200, representing the average on-chain acquisition price for bitcoin {BTC} held outside of exchange reserves and mov… [+1465 chars]
